sys_script.name: #2 Update vehicle status to unavaliable

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_848642_loaner_0_vehicle_tracker</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_848642_loaner_0_vehicle_tracker">vehicle_statusINPending Release,Out on Field,Returned for Inspection,Sent for Servicing^EQ<item display_value="Pending Release,Out on Field,Returned for Inspection,Sent for Servicing" endquery="false" field="vehicle_status" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="IN" or="false" value="Pending Release,Out on Field,Returned for Inspection,Sent for Servicing"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>#2 Update vehicle status to unavaliable</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
    //get the vehicle related to the vehicle tracker 
    var gr = new GlideRecord("x_848642_loaner_0_loaner_vehicle_catalog");
    gr.addQuery("sys_id", current.vehicle);
    gr.query();
    if (gr.next()) {
        //set the value of the vehicle to unavailable 
       gr.status = 'unavailable';
       gr.update();

    }


})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-08-02 01:37:17</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>8831c55f9750b110791bff36f053af88</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>#2 Update vehicle status to unavaliable</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Loaner Vehicle Request and Inventory" source="x_848642_loaner_0">84aafe80976b2110791bff36f053af21</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Loaner Vehicle Request and Inventory">84aafe80976b2110791bff36f053af21</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_8831c55f9750b110791bff36f053af88</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-08-02 01:51:53</sys_updated_on><template>vehicle.status=unavailable^EQ</template><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=8831c55f9750b110791bff36f053af88"/></record_update>
